dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4089 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3401 12th Street Northeast in Washington, District of Columbia, as the “Chuck Brown Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3401 12th Street Northeast in Washington, District of Columbia, as the Chuck Brown Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3401 12th Street Northeast in Washington, District of Columbia, shall be known and designated as the Chuck Brown Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Chuck Brown Post Office.
